explains: n. 政府公寓；特等舱；包房

sentences.en: He fled to his stateroom, where he lurked until the steamer was clear of the dock.
sentences.cn: 他逃回了他的豪华舱位，一直潜伏到轮船驶出码头。

sentences.en: But what good was sitting alone in my stateroom?
sentences.cn: 但是独自呆在我的特等舱里又有什么好处？

sentences.en: "You had better slip down into my stateroom now" I said moving off stealthily.
sentences.cn: “现在你最好不声不响地溜进我的睡舱去，”我说着，便悄悄地向前移步。
